headline: OHA is Administrative Agent and Lead Left Arranger of Private Debt Financing Supporting Montagu’s Acquisition of Tyber Medical
summary: New York, New York, June 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Oak Hill Advisors (“OHA”) served as Administrative Agent and Lead Left Arranger for the private senior debt financing supporting the acquisition of Tyber Medical, LLC (“Tyber Medical”) by Montagu Private Equity (“Montagu”). Tyber Medical is a leading orthopedic device manufacturer serving the spine and trauma end markets. As part of the transaction, Montagu will merge Tyber Medical with two of its existing portfolio companies, Resolve Surgica

Tyber Medical is a leading orthopedic device manufacturer serving the spine and trauma end markets. As part of the transaction, Montagu will merge Tyber Medical with two of its existing portfolio companies, Resolve Surgica
